room.name: The Entrance Hall
room.short_description: This is the entrance hall of the school.
room.long_description:
The entrance hall, also known as the front hall is located on the ground floor of the school.

  Exits:
  The Great Hall (E)
  The Astronomy Room (W)
  The Common Room (N)

room.name: The Great Hall
room.short_description: This is the great hall of the school.
room.long_description:
The great hall is the main gathering area in the school.

  Exits:
  The Entrance Hall (W)

room.name: The Astronomy Room
room.long_description:
The astronomy room is dedicated to the study of astronomy.

  Exits:
  The Entrance Hall (E)

room.name: The Common Room
room.long_description:
This room serves as the living quarters for students during the school year.

  Exits:
  The Entrance Hall (S)
  The Library (N)

room.name: The Library
room.long_description:
The library contains tens of thousands of books.

  Exits:
  TheCommon Room (S)
